metadata.title: CVE-2019-7334 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: Reflected Cross Site Scripting (XSS) exists in ZoneMinder through 1.32.3, allowing an attacker to execute HTML or JavaScript code via a vulnerable 'Exportfile' parameter value in the view export (export.php) because proper filtration is omitted.

criterions.comment: zoneminder package in impish is affected and needs fixing.
